meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the osmol of the solution to understand its pressure.
meanings.sent2: The osmol of the liquid indicated how much pressure it exerted.
meanings.sent3: The osmol of the water was so high that it seemed like the liquid was pushing against the container.

meanings.sent5: The osmol of the substance felt like a heavy weight on the system.
